author: chadfennell
message:
Grammar fix on forms.mdx (#82209)

grammar nit: "an API" is singular

Co-authored-by: JJ Kasper <jj@jjsweb.site>

files.patch:
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@ Forms enable you to create and update data in web applications. Next.js provides
 
 ## Server Forms
 
-To handle form submissions on the server, create an API endpoint securely mutate data.
+To handle form submissions on the server, create an API endpoint that securely mutates data.
 
 ```ts filename="pages/api/submit.ts" switcher
 import type { NextApiRequest, NextApiResponse } from 'next'
